about_the_game:
Boxing Legend simulates thousands of npcs in various gyms, based in different countrys. While you progress through the game multiple npcs are doing the same. Everbody wants to be at the top, whether amateurs or professionals. Older athletes may retire, thats a chance for you to rise up, but for every other boxer too. Shock the world and prove your will.

GAME MECHANICS

  • Create your own character and progress through different stages
  • Start as student, in your real world hometown with nothing more than a dream
  • Get an amteur boxing license and start competing in events
  • Make yourself a name in local and national championships
  • Every country has its national roster, maybe you get the honour to represent it at the Olympics
  • Whatever you achieve think about turning pro and get paid for boxing finally
  • If you decide to turn pro there is a hole world and many different associations to conquer
  • But maybe you prefer to be at the ring corner rather than in the ring yourself
  • Just try yourself as a trainer or if you are up for the big cash try to establish your own promotion
  • Its up to you, to become a Boxing Legend...
